message: What the fuck was that?!
I was forced out...?
No way...
Did I... fail?
My head aches, but there's no time to worry about that.
Though terrified, I get up and look Mink in the eye.
The cool gleam has returned.
Slowly, he rises.
I... didn't fail?
But I was forced out of his head...
I'm not sure what's going on...
...But I do know one thing.
Through Scrap, I learned Mink's true desire.
Now I have the answer to my question. I know what Mink is trying to achieve.
I know what lies beyond his steely gaze.
What Mink wants... <k>is death.
He'll take his revenge, and then, he'll die.
Toue massacred his people...
...Mink's heart must have died with them.
He has no future beyond revenge, no hope.
Whatever future he might have had, he discarded of his own volition.
"You can move."
When I said that to him, one of the chains binding him broke.
But that chain was just the spell cast by the guard's song when it forced us to relive the past.
The rest of those chains... were of Mink's own making.
The thought fills me with despair.
But at the same time, it all makes sense.
Everything Mink has said and done... I feel like I finally understand.
...My head is killing me.
It feels awful, like something is crawling around in my brain.

name: ミンク
message: "...You look like shit."
Mink smirks faintly.

name: ミンク
message: "Exhaustion, pain, frustration, despair. I can see it all in your face."
He knows.
Mink knows everything. That I used Scrap on him... that I learned his true desire.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Is that really enough for you?"
Though the pain in my head makes it hard, I force myself to look Mink in the eye.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is living like that... really enough for you?"

name: ミンク
message: "...I've never considered living any other way."
Suddenly, Mink grabs my arm.

name: ミンク
message: "...Something's been on my mind for a while."

name: ミンク
message: "We have the same scent."

name: ミンク
message: "Not the scent of life. Its opposite."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You mean..."
Mink narrows his eyes slightly, then lets go of my arm and turns toward the door.

name: ミンク
message: "Let's go."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where are we going?"

name: ミンク
message: "After Toue. He's above us."
Mink takes off at a sprint.
I chase after him, forcing myself to ignore the sense of helplessness gnawing at my gut.
